name: *NEW* SKINCARE: Dry skin therapy via Destress Express by Intelligent Nutrients
description:
Struggle with problem skin in Singapore? Are your feet so dry despite the countless pedicures or foot masks being used?

This dry skin therapy cream by Intelligent Nutrients hydrates thirsty knees, feet and elbows with a blend of organic butters boosted with their signature blend of calming, soothing aromas and oils. 

The unique combination also helps stimulate, strengthen, relieve tension, uplift, calm, and provide antiseptic, antibacterial, and antiviral properties.

• Coconut and castor oil soothe dry, chapped skin
• Olive oil targets roughness, cracks and calluses
• Carnauba and candelila wax lock in moisture for long lasting hydration
• Super antioxidant Intellimune® Seed Oil Complex protects against environmental aggressors and strengthens skin’s natural barrier

name: FRIZZY HAIR: Original Mineral Anti-hair frizz serum with organic Argan & Macadamia nut oil! (50mL)
description:
Sick of frizzy hair in Singapore? Join the club! Try this little gem called Frizzy Logic from Original Mineral, a brand that even Cameron Diaz swears by. 

Frizzy Logic contains cold-pressed certified organic Argan Oil and Macadamia Oil to calm and smooth down your hair, protects it from humidity, and adds shine to give a silky, lustrous texture.

name: MOSQUITOES: Intelligent Nutrients Organic Bug Repellant "Perfume" Spray (100mL)
description:
This bug repellant spray is like no other you have tried before! Certified organic, it is full of the good stuff (no DEET), and is so safe that you can even eat it! 

Even better, it smells great which is why it is called a "perfume"... filled with fragrant top notes of flowery geranium, refreshing peppermint and herbaceous lemongrass complemented with warm and woodsy notes of cedar and clove. Rosemary and citronella provide fullness for a truly enjoyable aromatic experience.

name: ORGANIC COSMETICS: Intelligent Nutrients Lipcare kit (3 organic food grade lip glosses + 1 lip balm)
description:
Lip Delivery Antioxidant Gloss is a USDA certified organic gluten-free lip-gloss combining powerful colorful antioxidant chemistry and nutritious food ingredients with a high antioxidant value. 

Every ingredient is chosen to feed your lips with power-packed antioxidants and Intelligent Nutrients®’ signature Antioxidant Intellimune® Seed Oil Complex to help battle oxidative stress and aid in fighting pre-mature aging while delivering delicious moisture and shine. 

It not only tastes good, it’s good for you.

Oh did we mention the lip balm can also be used on your dark circles under the eye? How amazing is that?!

The three glosses come in three different colours: new glazed peony, pink hibiscus and cranberry glow. 

All are 100% free of lead and other heavy metals, mined mineral and synthetic colorants, iron oxides, synthetic oils and waxes, mineral oil and petrolatum, artificial fragrances and phthalates, silicones and parabens.

Want to send it as a gift? Just let us know after ordering (email us at info@survivesg.com) and we will gift wrap it for free!

name: *NEW* HEALTH: Badger organic aromatic chest rub & inhalant for coughs & colds (2 oz tin)
description:
We love this balm because it is petroleum free, uses organic ingredients, does not contain camphor (which is not considered safe for children in large doses on the skin or if ingested) and this balm comes in a very generous 2 oz tin so you'll be using the stuff for years!

The balm can be used as a soothing chest rub, or as a steam inhalant when added to a humidifier or pot of hot water.

Created by a family run farm business in New Hampshire, this aromatic chest rub really works! The scent isn't too strong to be overpowering so children generally prefer this to other chest rubs out there (that can also have that "fake" minty smell)

Chest Rub Ingredients: 

*Extra Virgin Olive Oil, *Castor Oil, *Beeswax, Essential Oils of *Eucalyptus, *Lavender, *Peppermint, *Ravintsara, *Tangerine, *Tea Tree,  *Wild Marjoram, and CO2 Extracts of *Ginger and *Rosemary.

* = Certified Organic

name: *NEW* SKINCARE: Plant Stem Cell Renewal Complex by Intelligent Nutrients
description:
Intelligent Nutrients (a brand started by the co-founder of Aveda) has found a way to grow plant cells with antioxidant concentrations up to 1,000 times that of plants in nature. Those antioxidants prevent and address multiple signs of aging: fine lines, wrinkles, sunspots, loss of collagen and elastin, dehydration, and dullness. 

Oh did we mention they use entirely certified organic (and food-grade) ingredients? Get clearer, brighter, smoother, and yes—younger-looking—skin and forget all those chemically enhanced products you have tested over the years!

For general treatment of larger skin surface areas such as face, neck and décolleté, this concentrated serum will restore a youthful glow, while reducing the appearance of sun spots, fine lines, and other damage that comes with age and sun exposure.

This one vial contains 12mL, and we recommend using within one month after opening for maximum efficacy and preservation of the plant stem cell actives.

name: MOSQUITOES+SUN: Mosquito repellant + organic sunscreen (SPF34) by Badger Balm (87mL)
description:
How's this for convenience: a bug repellant and sunscreen all in one?! 

The sunscreen is a chemical free Zinc Oxide mineral sunscreen, combined with a DEET-free non-toxic bug repellent.

The bug repellent has been laboratory tested for efficacy., and it is shown to be effective for over 4 hours. It is also water resistant for 40 minutes.

The sunscreen has a pleasant scent of lemongrass & citronella. 

This sunscreen is also great for people who have sensitive skin and are acne prone, as it does not have any harmful chemicals and is not harsh on the skin. 

Comes in a 87mL squeezable tube

name: MOSQUITOES: Badger anti mosquito pack: anti-bug sunscreen, roll on stick and travel tin
description:
surviveSG wants to make your life easier. Buy the badger balm pack and you and your family can stay protected from mosquito bites!

Included in the pack - all DEET FREE and effectively repel mosquitoes:

Badger Anti-mosquito sunscreen: water resistant, safe for kids, protects from the sun and mosquitoes

Badger Anti bug twist up stick: sweat resistant, rolls on for easy application, safe for babies 6 months and over (for under 6 months, double check with the doctor). 

Badger Anti bug travel balm: perfect size to throw into your clutch bag and rub on ankles, elbows, toes and anywhere else you usually get bitten.

All of the above have a lemongrass scent (from the essential oils used) and have no harmful chemicals in them. And surviveSG has tested every single on of these to make sure they are effective!

name: *NEW* HAIRCARE for dry/damaged/coloured hair: Intelligent Nutrients Pure Luxe Organic Shampoo
description:
So what's so great about this shampoo?

For those of you out there that struggle with incredibly dry or damaged hair thanks to the humidity/ colouring / general chemical abuse over the years, or struggle to control your thick, coarse unruly hair then this extremely moisturising and nourishing shampoo is for you. 

First of, the founder of the Intelligent Nutrients brand (who previously founded Aveda) is so adamant about the purity of his products that he grows many of his ingredients on his own organic farm.

For those with coloured hair, this shampoo is filled with plant actives that help provide color retention

This shampoo helps to repair and replenish dry and damaged hair whilst protecting the natural oils found on hair and scalp without stripping or causing build-up.

If you have thin or fine hair, then we would recommend using this shampoo as a weekly moisturising treatment instead of daily use. 

The fragrance is entirely natural (so it smells way better than a lot of shampoos out there) and is a mix of lemongrass, ylang ylang and geranium.

name: *NEW* HAIRCARE for dry/damaged/coloured hair: Intelligent Nutrients Pure Luxe Organic Conditioner
description:
The Harmonic PureLuxe Conditioner helps restore moisture to the hair, protects the hair shaft and smooths the cuticle layer.

If you have EXTREMELY dry, brittle hair, then we would recommend using this conditioner as your shampoo, as it contains protein and moisture-rich emollients to help restore and smooth the cuticle layer and protect the hair shaft

You can also use the conditioner as a body cleanser, styling cream and shave cream.

The Pure Luxe range has a soothing, therapeutic scent and contain lemongrass, ylang ylang and geranium oils. The formulas are gentle, help reduce color fading thanks to its low pH levels and are also good for coarse hair types.

name: *NEW* HAIRCARE: O&M 7 Day Miracle Intense Moisturising Hair Mask
description:
Who doesn't suffer from dry hair in the hot, humid climate that is Singapore? Well now we have the solution - the O&M 7 day miracle is suitable for ALL hair types including curly, coloured and damaged hair! 

After using this masque your hair will transform from dry, dull looking locks to sleek, glossy and downright gorgeous! It WON'T transform your hair into an oil slick (gross) and it is lightweight enough not to weigh your hair down either. 

Abused your hair with hairdryers, GHD's or just general neglect? This mask (which is sulphate free and doesn’t contain parabens, propylene, MIT, glycol, phthalates or triclosan) will get you out of trouble!

Use between your shampoo & conditioner, you can leave it on for 2-10 minutes depending on how busy your day is... All you need to do is apply a small amount of this to the mid lengths to ends of hair and comb it through, then wash it out!

We definitely think it's worth letting your hair air-dry after the mask, as it will leave your hair even softer and more healthy (sometimes it's nice to give the hairdryer a break!).

name: *NEW* HAIRCARE: O&M Know Knott Hair Conditioning Detangler spray
description:
Loved our O&M anti-frizz serum? Now try the O&M hair detangling spray!

The cold pressed organic ingredients in this pretty pink bottle work hard to untangle and condition your hair, and it also works great with the Singapore humidity. 

250mL spray bottle.

name: MEN'S SKINCARE: Shower Gift Set - Shampoo, Conditioner and Body Wash by Gentlemen's Tonic
description:
Looking for the perfect gift for your man and run out of ideas?

Here is your answer!

Buy the Gentleman's Tonic gift pack which includes their daily shampoo, protein conditioner and gentle body wash all from their Babassu and Bergamot range. 

The collection consists of a striking blend of naturally based plant-derived materials from sustained and renewable resources.

The bespoke fragrance combines a base of Indonesian Patchouli (very masculine!) with a citrus accord of Sicilian lemon, energising bergamot and relaxing lavender.

SHAMPOO: This shampoo not only smells masculine, it also contains ginger which invigorates the scalp and helps promote hair growth. Suitable for all hair types, this gently cleanses and revitalises hair and scalp whilst also removing excess build-up of hair care products, toxins and environmental pollutants. 

CONDITIONER: The proteins help to improve hair strength, body and manageability whilst also acting as a natural moisturiser for dry hair. Suitable for all hair types.

BODY WASH: Cleanses and energises, this body wash smells masculine and fresh and also includes menthol and ginger to energise the skin whilst the honey and wheat extracts help to soften and condition tired skin.

Smart, stylish and classic packaging which is perfect as a gift idea, and the gift box itself is 100% recyclable.

name: MOSQUITOES: Anti bug balm twist-up stick by Badger - no more mosquito bites! (1.5oz)
description:
This anti mosquito balm twist up stick contains natural ingredients of citronella, cedar, lemongrass, rosemary and geranium essential oils. 

It's DEET-free, soothes dry skin, smells great and really works (we have tested it in SIngapore and have yet to be bitten!).

The balm is contained conveniently in a twist up stick, so you can easily throw this in your handbag or take on your travels and not be worried about liquid spillage, 100mL travel requirements for planes etc.

name: MOSQUITOES: Anti bug balm by Badger - no more mosquito bites thanks to a handy tin! (0.75 oz)
description:
No more smelly repellant from the chemist that doesn't even work!

Try this anti-bug balm by Badger - it's all natural, DEET free and smells great - not to mention we have tried it ourselves in Singapore and it really repels mosquitoes - we are yet to be bitten!

The balm contains natural ingredients of citronella, cedar, lemongrass, rosemary and geranium essential oils.

The balm will last for 3-4 hours for mosquitoes, and is conveniently packaged in a 0.75oz tin which can fit in any handbag, and is perfect for travel.

name: BEST HAIRCARE: Intelligent Nutrients Organic Harmonic Shampoo - 2013 Winner, Women's Weekly
description:
This shampoo has a serious cult following. As soon as you try it, we think you won't want to try any other shampoo ever again. It also won the 2013 Women's Weekly Best Haircare award.

So what's all the fuss? Not only does it smell absolutely amazing (fresh and minty - a very refreshing shampoo which is great for Singapore!), but it will remove all that buildup in your hair to leave it feeling properly clean without using any awful chemicals. 

It's non-toxic, gluten free, and there are no artificial fragrances. You can wash your hair everyday using this and it won't dry your hair out thanks to the amazing essential oils used to moisturise and also help to fight hair frizz. 

AND it's suitable for all hair types! 

For those die-hard fans of this product, note we even stock the ECO SIZE bottle (946mL)!

name: BEST HAIRCARE: Intelligent Nutrients: Organic Harmonic Conditioner 2013 Winner, Women's Weekly
description:
This minty conditioner infused with essential oils is a natural hair softener and is perfect for all hair types! 

Having a non-toxic, sulphate free and colour-safe conditioner is great, but so is the fact that depending on your hair type, you could use this as a leave-in conditioner for your hair! Simply massage into the hair and head out the door!

Formulated without sulfates, parabens, silicones, ethoxylates, PEG, phthalates, and synthetic fragrances. So to sum it up, you won't find any evil in this bottle!

name: BEST BODY WASH: Intelligent Nutrients Organic Harmonic Body Wash w/peppermint + menthol = cooling!
description:
There are those who swear by the Harmonic range by Intelligent Nutrients. This body wash is uplifting and even exhilarating thanks to the peppermint essential oils. 

Not only will this body wash wake you up with a bang, it foams beautifully and a little goes a long way! 

Non-toxic, gluten free and formulated by using only pure, safe and beneficial ingredients - you can even use this wash on your face!

We know it may seem pricey for a body wash, but this will last you a while, so fear not!

name: *NEW* HAIRCARE: TRAVEL SIZE (60mL) Intelligent Nutrients Organic Harmonic Shampoo
description:
his shampoo has a serious cult following, and if you love to travel, or just want to see what all the hype is about, then this travel size is perfect for you!

As soon as you try it, we bet you won't want to try any other shampoo ever again. It won the 2013 Women's Weekly Best Haircare award for a reason...

So what's all the fuss? Not only does it smell absolutely amazing (fresh and minty - a very refreshing shampoo which is great for Singapore!), but it will remove all that buildup in your hair to leave it feeling properly clean without using any awful chemicals. 

It's non-toxic, gluten free, and there are no artificial fragrances. You can wash your hair everyday using this and it won't dry out your hair thanks to the amazing essential oils used to moisturise and also help to fight hair frizz. 

AND it's suitable for all hair types!

name: *NEW* HAIRCARE: TRAVEL SIZE (60mL) Intelligent Nutrients Organic Harmonic Conditioner
description:
This minty conditioner infused with essential oils is a natural hair softener and is perfect for all hair types! The Intelligent Nutrients Harmonic range has a loyal customer base in the US, UK and now Singapore who swear by these hair care products - try out the travel size version to see if you will join them! 

Having a non-toxic, sulphate free and colour-safe conditioner is great, but so is the fact that depending on your hair type, you could use this as a leave-in conditioner for your hair! Simply massage into the hair and head out the door!

Formulated without sulfates, parabens, silicones, ethoxylates, PEG, phthalates, and synthetic fragrances. So to sum it up, you won't find any evil in this bottle!

name: BEAT THE HEAT: Red Flower Organic Face & Body Mist Ionizing Botanical Toning Mist (100.5mL)
description:
This is the luxury mist to take on your travels, especially on long flights.

With the penetrating power of pure plant hydrosols (concentrated flower water extracted through steam-distillation) and whole essential oils, this mist will help to tone and balance stressed skin. 

This mist also contains negative ions which are shown to promote alpha brain waves, improve awareness and reduce anxiety, creating a feeling of joy. 

A blend of refreshing botanicals and fruits including pure rose flower water, lavendar, revitalizing birch, juniper berry, tangerine and pink grapefruit notes, this mist will leave your skin feeling hydrated, relaxed and radiant.

The Red Flower brand is loved by celebrities including Anne Hathaway, Beyonce, Gwyneth Paltrow and Scarlet Johansson.

name: BEAT THE HEAT: Red Flower Organic Face & Body Mist Japanese Springs- Rose, Camellia & Plum (100.5mL)
description:
Inspired by the steam filled air of the bathhouse and aromas from the Japanese outdoor hot springs, this luxury soft-water mist helps the skin to breathe by keeping pores toned, bringing deep hydration and replenishment whenever the skin feels dehydrated and dull. 

Plum wine helps to anti-oxidize and reveal a fresh layer of skin, while soft-water, sweet-smelling camellia, rose and plum blossoms provide the pleasure of dewy fresh skin.

High in vitamins A, C and E, these blossoms help keep skin fresh and glowing. 

Red Flower is currently used at the Fullerton Hotel spa in Singapore, and is loved by celebrities including Anne Hathaway, Beyonce, Gwyneth Paltrow and Scarlet Johansson.

name: BEAT THE HEAT: Red Flower Organic Face & Body Mist: Hammam Detox Spa with Orange & Quince (100.5mL)
description:
Ever had such a stressful, highly strung day that you think you might end up in a flood of tears? Well carry this face mist with you. Be in the dewy wetness of a steam filled hammam. softly mist this blend of stimulating citrus oils and quince over the hair, face and body to replenish and awaken the skin. deliver light hydration and a flush of oxygen to the skin, 

This is the perfect gift for someone who needs a "spa-like" experience on the go. 

Red Flower is currently used at the Fullerton Hotel spa in Singapore, and is a brand loved by celebrities including Anne Hathaway, Beyonce, Gwyneth Paltrow and Scarlet Johansson.

name: BEST SKINCARE: Certified organic food-grade virgin coconut oil for the skin & food/cooking!  (125mL)
description:
One for the dresser and one for the ... kitchen? Put this ON your skin AND eat it too!

This food-grade, organic skinutraceutical is a true “oil”-rounder — as it is great for the skin on the outside as it is for the skin (and cells, heart and overall health) on the inside. Heck even Miranda Kerr swears by it!  So slather, drizzle and sauté your way to better skin and nutrition all via this bottle - how amazing is that?!

This oil is an incomparable moisturizer for face and body with fatty acids native to skin, without being greasy, as it soaks in to your skin quickly with no sticky afterfeel! 

In terms of food use, you can put this in salads or even use it as cooking oil. Most of this oil is processed more quickly by the body and contributes less to body fat, whilst also being cholesterol and trans-fat free... so no wonder Miranda Kerr eats so much of this stuff! Kerr also puts this oil in her green tea. 

Dr Oz (celebrity MD from the USA) even states virgin coconut oil is a great tool for weight loss by speeding up the metabolism!

Cold first-pressed - which means it is as fresh from the tree and as unprocessed as possible.

For all skin types, even extremely dry and/or medically-managed conditions.


For Women, Men, Children ages 0+

name: BEST COSMETICS: Shizens mascara "brush on" lashes - no more falsies required, looks natural!
description:
If you are sick of your mascara giving you clumpy, unnatural looking lashes, and tired of wasting money on false ones, then it's time to check out this mascara set from Shizens.

Once you've used this mascara set, you won't bother with any of those other brands that claim to give you longer, thicker lashes. This one actually delivers, and the end result looks natural and your lashes feel soft (rather than clumpy and hard).

How does it work?

The secret is in the "Eye Charm" which has hundreds of tiny natural lash fibres enriched with pro-vitamin (from the USA) which instantly extend your lashes and allow them to naturally appear fuller. And trust us, it really works! 

How to apply?
First you apply a round of mascara (easy enough). 

Then you apply the "eye charm" to the roots of your lashes.

Then you apply another round of mascara from the roots to the tips.

Now here's the best part. You can leave it at that, or if you really want to create "hollywood" lashes, then just keep repeating the steps above until you are happy - the lashes will get longer and thicker after each round!

Most importantly, Shizens is one of Korea's renowned brands that feature natural and environmentally friendly products.

This set comes with 1 Shizens Eye Charm and 1 Shizens Mascara. You won't use any other type of mascara again!

name: BEST COSMETICS: Shizens lip painter & gloss - better than lipstick, only apply once a day!
description:
This lip painter + gloss all in one bottle will change your life - no more lipstick smudges or stains on clothes, and no need to keep on reapplying your lippy throughout the day! Now you can have natural rosy lips without the mess.

This lip painter only needs to be applied ONCE a day and you're done! 

First you use the lip painter (a white cream), which uses natural active ingredients to transform your dark pigmented lips into natural rosy tones within seconds…and it will last the whole day! You just apply to your lips for a few seconds, and then wipe it off - you will notice the difference immediately! 

Then if you want to add a glossy look, simply apply the lip gloss (infused with Vitamin C and collagen production properties), which is specially formulated to minimize the formation of fine lines and moisturize dry cracked lips. 

You can also use the lip painter cream on your face as a blusher - it really works! 

And the best news is - you only need to apply a little bit, so this bottle will last.

name: *NEW* COSMETICS: Shizens Eyebrow enhancer - fills in your brows but looks natural!
description:
This eyebrow enhancer sculpts and fills in eyebrows with natural tiny fibers and natural Italian terra mineral clay – an ultra fine formulated powder infused with sea minerals, fine blend of herbs and precious ingredients.

The result? You can create an eyebrow shape that looks far more natural and flattering compared to those eyebrow pencils!

There are two colours available: Light brown for lighter eyebrows and dark brown for those with darker hair.

name: BEST SUNCARE: Lightweight Sports Sunscreen (SPF70+) - no white marks - by VMV (85g/3 Oz.)
description:
One of VMV's best-selling products around the world, this powerful protector is beloved for its wow-inducing lightweight comfort, fast absorption into the skin (no white marks left on skin!) and efficacy even in extreme outdoor conditions.

This sunscreen offers impressive protection to effectively screen out UVA and UVB rays for active protection against sun-induced skin cancer, photo-aging and hyper pigmentation.

Very water resistant and for all skin types, this sunscreen can be used on the face and the body. 

It is fragrance free, 100% dye, phthalate + PABA free and recommended for men, women and children from the age of 9 upwards (Babies and children under the age of 9 are encouraged to use our Badger balm sunscreen range instead).

For best results, apply 30 minutes prior to sun exposure, particularly before highly active sports.

name: SENSITIVE SKINCARE: Anti-acne Id Gel by VMV Hypoallergenics (120mL)
description:
Having trouble finding a great anti-acne treatment in Singapore that really works?

This gel treats acne for the face, chest, back, arms, posterior, thighs etc. 

And what about sweat acne? Sweat acne is a fungal condition that does not respond to traditional anti- acne antibiotics. In clinical studies, this gel had a success rate of 100% when treating sweat acne, while keeping skin cooler, preventing over-sweating, and therefore preventing recurrence. Unlike less skin-friendly antibiotics and anti- fungals, this gel showed 0% irritation.

Packed with a unique, skin-safe, coconut-derived antibacterial, monolaurin, this superbly simple skin treatment packs one powerhouse of a skin-protective and therapeutic punch.

On top of all this, it disinfects skin and works as a mattifier to control shine and keep skin feeling cool and fresh. It doesn't dry your skin like other products, instead it soothes and softens your skin! 

This gel can be used on bare skin OR with makeup to prevent shine and give skin a naturally fresh, matte finish - amazing!

100% All-Types-Of-Fragrance-Free
100% Dye, Phthalate, Paraben + Preservative-Free

name: ORGANIC BABY: Baby Balm by Badger: Great for scratches, rashes and sensitive skin!
description:
This balm is perfect for your baby's delicate skin which is 100% natural, safe and soothing (and it really works!).

The balm is great to sooth itching, discomfort and redness associated with diaper rash, cradle cap and dry skin patches. It even helps to heal any scratches, and can also be used for a calming and moisturising baby massage and gentle baby belly rub!

Ingredients include organic extra virgin olive oil (to soften and moisturise delicate skin), mild chamomile (calming) and gentle calendula (to soothe and protect the skin).

name: ORGANIC BABY+SUN: Baby sunscreen (SPF 34) - by Badger - one of the safest sunscreens!
description:
This is one of the safest baby sunscreens on the market - and we've certainly done our research!

Many sunscreens contain chemicals and nano-sized particles of Zinc Oxide, which many people believe aid the growth of skin cancer. 

Badger baby sunscreen contains non-nano Zinc Oxide to protect from both UVA & UVB rays, in a base of safe, soothing USDA Certified Organic ingredients. It is water & sweat resistant for 40 minutes, biodegradable, and works immediately upon application. 

Badger sunscreens have been recommended by the USA Environmental Working Group, Consumer Reports, the TODAY show, SAFBaby.com and numerous other sources. 

Comes in a 87mL squeezable tube.

name: ORGANIC BABY: Baby Soap by Badger Balm with Chamomile & Calendula
description:
Badger baby soap is moisturizing and non-irritating, with dreamy lather and fabulous essential oil fragrances that are exceptionally good for your skin. 

These handmade soaps are made from all natural and organic ingredients.

Chamomile and Calendula help to calm and relax your baby, oils of Extra Virgin Olive and Coconut gently cleanse, and Shea Butter moisturizes and soothes delicate skin. This soap is also great for those with sensitive skin!

NO detergents, foaming agents, artificial "fragrance", colours, synthetic or harsh ingredients!

name: SUNCARE: After Sun care balm by Badger - soothes and heals sunburn + moisturises! (0.75oz tin)
description:
Ever got sunburnt in Singapore? Yes, we thought so. It's not exactly easy avoiding the sun here.

Packed with soothing Cocoa and Shea Butters,  this balm will help your skin feel hydrated and super smooth. Lavender and Moroccan Blue Tansy oils contribute to the delightful tropical scent and have been shown to exhibit anti-inflammatory properties, helping to soothe, cool, and relieve your dry, tight skin after sun exposure. 

Also contains Seabuckthorn berry extract, a super anti-oxidant and has been used for centuries as an anti-aging ingredient.

This after sun balm contains certified organic and natural ingredients, and is USDA approved.

name: Night Night Balm (SLEEP BALM FOR KIDS), certified organic - by Badger Balm (0.75oz tin)
description:
This special kid-friendly 100% natural sleep balm contains essential oils that are known to promote feelings of safety, cheerfulness, reverence and calm.

The balm contains Chamomile, Lavender, Sandalwood, Mandarin and Spearmint to help children unwind after a long day of growing and playing.

Rub a little on to temples, neck, belly, wrists or anywhere that will help to diffuse the wonderful aroma into the air around the child.

name: HEADACHE Soother Balm (Organic & 100% natural) by Badger (1oz tin)
description:
If you experience headaches a lot or know someone who is constantly getting migraines, then this soothing balm might just do the trick.

This is a cooling aromatherapy temple balm that can be applied to pulse points to cool and refresh your achy head anytime, anywhere.

The balm contains all natural ingredients including Eucalyptus and Peppermint (stimulating and refreshing), Lavender (supports balance and calm) and Mandarin (uplifting).

The 1oz tin will last you a long time, as you only need to use a small amount every time. 

The balm itself is simply a combination of extra virgin olive oil and beeswax. 

Think of this as portable aromatherapy treatment in a tin!

name: SENSITIVE SKINCARE: Gentle yet effective Deodorant by VMV Hypoallergenics
description:
This skin-safe antiperspirant spray prevents bumps, irritations, redness, discomfort and darkening of the underarms whilst providing intensive control against perspiration for very sensitive skin.

Got clammy hands or sweaty feet? This spray can also be used for your palms and soles of feet too! 

It works to provide all day dryness and odour prevention, with NO aluminium zirconium, fragrances, dyes or other irritating ingredients, And it will not stain or affect fabrics either!

name: BABY+SENSITIVE SKIN: Baby + Pregnant Mum All-Over Lotion by VMV Hypoallergenics! (185mL)
description:
An ultra-nourishing body lotion for babies and mums-to-be.  The lotion is soft and gentle, with a natural coconut smell (from one of the coconut derived ingredients included in this lotion).

Great to relieve itchy bellies for pregnant women, and it is fragrance, paraben and preservative free.

If you have extremely sensitive skin, atopic skin or are allergic to most creams and lotions, this lotion is a safe and effective way to hydrate your skin with no oilness.

name: BABY+SENSITIVE SKIN: Grandma Minnie's Hand Sanitizer (travel size) by VMV Hypoallergenics
description:
Sick of using harsh hand sanitizer with that strong alcohol smell and worried it may be too harsh for your baby/kiddies?

Here's a solution: try this gentle yet effective hand sanitizer by VMV Hypoallergenics. 

This sanitizer uses a naturally anti-bacterial ingredient derived from coconut, which is clinically proven to be as effective as 70% isopropyl alcohol and topical antibiotics. To ensure it is effective, this sanitizer still does contain some alcohol, but it evaporates immediately upon application and instead of drying out the skin (like usual alcohol-based sanitizers), the natural coconut derivative actually softens, soothes, and moisturises the skin!

This sanitizer is safe to use directly on babies & kids hands and their toys (we particularly recommend using this after play dates and nursery/school) and is 100% fragrance free with no parabens and preservatives. 

Sold in a handy travel size so you can easily throw this in the handbag!

name: BABY+SENSITIVE SKIN: Grandma Minnie's Baby Boo Boo Balm by VMV Hypoallergenics
description:
This is one of VMV Hypoallergenics most popular products worldwide for babies of all ages (even adults!) for its soothing, healing abilities and multi-use flexibility—like a skin “swiss army knife”:

1. Quick, ouchless healing for various cuts, nicks, scrapes, rashes, even minor burns

2. An excellent lip balm that soothes and repairs even very dry, chapping lips and irritated lesions

3. Soothes and softens extremely dry patches of skin (even cracked, flaking skin, eczema, etc.)

4. Some customers even use this as a nostril healer in allergy season (and in very dry environments like airplanes or when skiing), a hair fly-away tamer, and an eyebrow shaper, too!

The balm is free of fragrance, parabens and preservatives and does not contain common allergens.

It is suitable for infants and children, as well as pregnant and nursing mummies - and even for adults!

name: BABY+SENSITIVE SKIN: Baby + Do-it-all Oil by VMV Hypoallergenics (75mL)
description:
Two ingredients, countless uses.

USDA- certified organic virgin coconut oil for incomparable soothing + moisturizing.

Coconut-derived monolaurin for gentle-yet-powerful antibacterial disinfection.

Soothes, softens + salves even dastardly dry, sensitive, seborrheic, atopic skin. 

This is THE product to buy if you baby has eczema, rosacea or psoriasis.

Other uses: 

Prevents diaper rash.

For hair detangling (although we must advise you use very little of the oil for this - otherwise it will get greasy!)

For massages.

Ouchless wound cleaning, too. Whew!

An oil-in-one must-have for mums & munchins.

Oil's well that ends well!

name: SENSITIVE SKINCARE: Clarifying Soap body cleanser w/Apricot by VMV Hypoallergenics
description:
This soap is great to keep in the shower as an invigorating, stimulating cleanser for the body. 

Contains salicylic acid to sustain VMV Hypoallergenic Id System's anti- acne, anti-inflammatory, exfoliating process, plus Apricot Kernels to buff, massage and stimulate the skin, while sloughing off dull, old skin cells to keep skin fresh, soft, smooth, and clear!

The soap helps to clear up pimples, chicken skin and other skin bumps from all over body skin.

100% fragrance free, paraben and preservative free - for men and women! Perfect for those with sensitive skin!

name: *NEW* MEN'S SKINCARE: Daily foaming cleanser with Babassu & Bergamot by Gentlemen's Tonic in London
description:
Struggling to find a decent men's face cleanser in Singapore? We have the answer with this daily foaming cleanser by Gentlemen's Tonic.

The cleanser is suitable for all skin types, lifts away excess oils and impurities and is gentle on the skin.

The key ingredients of Babassu and Bergamot not only produce a naturally sexy scent, it also helps to provide protection with anti-aging properties and upon application produces a cooling effect. 

This cleanser will help maintain a healthy complexion by maintaining the skin's natural pH balance, and provides added moisture boost to ensure skin remains hydrated.  

Free from parabens, petroleum derivates, articifial colours and extracts, synthetic perfumes, TEA/ DEA, harmful chemical additives and sodium laurel/laureth sulphate.

name: *NEW* MEN'S SKINCARE: Traditional shave cream by Gentlemen's Tonic in London
description:
This traditional shave cream provides a rich, moisturising lather for those who prefer a lathering shave experience. 

The babassu oil protects the skin from drying during the shave, and the manuka honey moisturises, nourishes, rejuvenates and protects the skin.

This shave cream is best applied with a shaving brush but can also be applied with your fingers. It allows for a close, comfortable shave and was developed in conjunction with the Gentlemen's Tonic master barbers.

The Babassu and Bergamot range was researched and developed over two years with one of Britain's leading formulators. The bespoke fragrance combines a base of patchouli with a citrus accord of Sicilian lemon, energising bergamot and relaxing lavender. Trust us - most men love this scent. 

Quality product that looks great in the bathroom - lovely gift idea too!

Free from parabens, petroleum derivates, articifial colours and extracts, synthetic perfumes, TEA/ DEA, harmful chemical additives and sodium laurel/laureth sulphate.

125g (4.4oz)

name: RAIN: Slender manual stick umbrella by Totes
description:
These umbrellas are the ultimate classy accessory that not only shields you from the rain in Singapore, but with its SunGuard UPF50+ coating it also protects you from the sun!

The slender stick means these umbrellas are lightweight and easy to carry around yet sturdy enough to deal with the elements! 

And because Totes believes in the quality of its products, they are offering 1 for 1 exchange for customers of damaged items.

name: RAIN: Mini umbrellas by Totes (manual open)
description:
These pocket umbrellas are so easy to throw in your handbag to protect you from Singapore's unpredictable weather!

Although these umbrellas are small, they provide large coverage and can also protect you from the sun with a SunGuard UPF 50+ protection coat incorporated into the fabric of the umbrella.

A stylish silver handle completes this highly fashionable and functional umbrella.

This lightweight choice comes with a storage sleeve in matching color and an elastic carrying strap. 

And how about this for service: Totes believes in the quality of their umbrellas so much that they will offer a 1 to 1 exchange for customers with damaged items!

name: RAIN: Bubble umbrellas by Totes
description:
The dome design protects you from the rain and wind, whilst the clear canopy allows you to see through the umbrella so you know where you are going!

Made popular by TV shows such as Gossip Girl,  these sturdy umbrellas are also perfect for weddings due to their classy look,

Or if you would like to try something a bit more fun, check out the polka dot bubble umbrella which is also available!
